data.description:
The Gameplay
You play as a god-like creature as big as entire solar systems. Your task as a player is to defend your home solar system from invading aliens and to protect it from natural disasters. Use your arsenal of weapons to fight off the enemy but make sure to not cause too much collateral damage!

Key Features
- Fully destructible universe
- 21 exciting levels with increasing difficulty
- High score system with up to 3 stars per level - can you get a new high score ?
- Cause chain reactions to get even higher scores
- Planetary gravity simulation (also for fragments of planets and other objects)
- Various weapons like laser guns, rockets, asteroids, ...
- Space combat with allies and enemy fleets
- Natural disasters like meteor strikes
- Realistic spaceship physics simulation with thruster-based navigation and autonomous collision avoidance

Planned Extensions
- More adventurous levels
- More space stuff: Black holes, asteroid belts, ...
- More natural disasters 
- More weapons: cluster rockets, gravity gun, ...

changelog.change_log:
# 0.13.0
### Features
- Fragments can now be grabbed and thrown
- Orbiters of a destroyed planet are now correctly attracted by gravity after their parent is destroyed
- Planet collision damage massively increased. All which touches a planet/sun gets destroyed.
- Picked better outline colors for allies and enemies.
- Replaced level 2.3 and 3.3
- Added new level 2.4
- Improve display of damage numbers
- Improved typing sound in tutorials
- Improved level start / level end menus
- Add more buildings to planets
### Bugfixes
- Fixed bug where allies and enemies are not correctly detected
- Rockets are now correctly targeted and destoryed by lasers

# 0.8.0
### Bugfixes
- Many small bugfixes
### Features
- Improved splash screen when loading game
- Ray interactor now retracts when no target is available
- Planets now have some houses
- Spacestations have more health
- Swapped systems 2 and 3 for a clearer story
- Reworked spaceship navigation characteristics and tuned repsonsiveness
- Added credits page
- Removed outdated weapon tablet.
- Added localization for german and english
- The rocket gun now spawns cluster rockets
